00016 package pl.mg6.android.maps.extensions.impl;
00017 
00018 import java.util.ArrayList;
00019 import java.util.List;
00020 
00021 import pl.mg6.android.maps.extensions.utils.SphericalMercator;
00022 
00023 import com.google.android.gms.maps.model.LatLng;
00024 import com.google.android.gms.maps.model.LatLngBounds;
00025 import com.google.android.gms.maps.model.Polyline;
00026 import com.google.android.gms.maps.model.PolylineOptions;
00027 
00028 class DebugHelper {
00029 
00030         private List<Polyline> gridLines = new ArrayList<Polyline>();
00031 
00032         void drawDebugGrid(IGoogleMap map, double clusterSize) {
00033                 cleanup();
00034                 IProjection projection = map.getProjection();
00035                 LatLngBounds bounds = projection.getVisibleRegion().latLngBounds;
00036                 double minY = -180 + clusterSize * (int) (SphericalMercator.scaleLatitude(bounds.southwest.latitude) / clusterSize);
00037                 double minX = -180 + clusterSize * (int) (SphericalMercator.scaleLongitude(bounds.southwest.longitude) / clusterSize);
00038                 double maxY = -180 + clusterSize * (int) (SphericalMercator.scaleLatitude(bounds.northeast.latitude) / clusterSize);
00039                 double maxX = -180 + clusterSize * (int) (SphericalMercator.scaleLongitude(bounds.northeast.longitude) / clusterSize);
00040 
00041                 for (double y = minY; y <= maxY; y += clusterSize) {
00042                         gridLines.add(map.addPolyline(new PolylineOptions().width(1.0f).add(new LatLng(SphericalMercator.toLatitude(y), bounds.southwest.longitude),
00043                                         new LatLng(SphericalMercator.toLatitude(y), bounds.northeast.longitude))));
00044                 }
00045                 if (minX <= maxX) {
00046                         for (double x = minX; x <= maxX; x += clusterSize) {
00047                                 gridLines.add(map.addPolyline(new PolylineOptions().width(1.0f).add(new LatLng(bounds.southwest.latitude, x),
00048                                                 new LatLng(bounds.northeast.latitude, x))));
00049                         }
00050                 } else {
00051                         for (double x = -180; x <= minX; x += clusterSize) {
00052                                 gridLines.add(map.addPolyline(new PolylineOptions().width(1.0f).add(new LatLng(bounds.southwest.latitude, x),
00053                                                 new LatLng(bounds.northeast.latitude, x))));
00054                         }
00055                         for (double x = maxX; x < 180; x += clusterSize) {
00056                                 gridLines.add(map.addPolyline(new PolylineOptions().width(1.0f).add(new LatLng(bounds.southwest.latitude, x),
00057                                                 new LatLng(bounds.northeast.latitude, x))));
00058                         }
00059                 }
00060         }
00061 
00062         void cleanup() {
00063                 for (Polyline polyline : gridLines) {
00064                         polyline.remove();
00065                 }
00066                 gridLines.clear();
00067         }
00068 }
